cells.data:
-- drop :: Int -> [a] -> [a]
-- drop :: Int -> String -> String
on drop(n, xs)
    set c to class of xs
    if script is not c then
        if string is not c then
            if n < length of xs then
                items (1 + n) thru -1 of xs
            else
                {}
            end if
        else
            if n < length of xs then
                text (1 + n) thru -1 of xs
            else
                ""
            end if
        end if
    else
        take(n, xs) -- consumed
        return xs
    end if
end drop
